linkjvm.motors

Class Servo

  • java.lang.Object
    • linkjvm.motors.Servo

  • public class Servo
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a servo object with a given port.
    Since:
    2.1.0
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Markus Klein

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Servo(int port)
      Constructs a new servo using the giver port.
